model_id.description: The unique identifier of the trained model.

cache_size.description: A byte-size value for configuring the inference cache size. For example, 20mb.

number_of_allocations.description: The number of model allocations on each node where the model is deployed.

threads_per_allocation.description: The number of threads used by each model allocation during inference.

queue_capacity.description: Controls how many inference requests are allowed in the queue at a time.

timeout.description: Controls the amount of time to wait for the model to deploy.

wait_for.description: The allocation status for which to wait
